Attacks.Name: Twinneedle
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, this character gains power equal to the damage dealt. If a wild is rolled during this attack, this attack may be made again targeting the same character. This additional attack does not generate power.

Attacks.Name: Poison Jab
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, the target character gains the Poison special condition.

Superpowers.Name: Swarm
Superpowers.Effect: When this character is attacking, it may reroll one attack die for each allied Bug-type character within Range 2.

Superpowers.Name: Agility
Superpowers.Effect: This character immediately makes a move action. This superpower can be used only once per turn.

Attacks.Name: Fury Attack
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled during this attack, this attack may be made again targeting the same character. This additional attack does not generate power.

Superpowers.Name: Adaptability
Superpowers.Effect: When this character is attacked, it may change one of its blank results to a hit result.
